name: pinchflat
description: Pinchflat is a self-hosted tool for downloading, archiving, and managing YouTube videos. It supports scheduled downloads, playlists, and integration with media servers via a web UI.
features: YouTube downloads: Download videos from YouTube channels, playlists, and individual URLs with configurable quality settings.
Scheduled archiving: Automatically check for and download new videos from subscribed channels on a schedule.
Playlist management: Subscribe to playlists and automatically download new videos as they're added.
Quality selection: Choose preferred video quality, format, and codec for downloads to balance quality and storage.
Metadata extraction: Automatically save video metadata including titles, descriptions, thumbnails, and subtitles.
Media server integration: Organize downloads in formats compatible with Plex, Jellyfin, and other media servers.
Web interface: Manage subscriptions, monitor downloads, and configure settings through a clean web UI.
Storage management: Set storage limits and automatically delete old videos to manage disk space.
Download history: Track all downloaded videos with status, dates, and file locations.
Subtitle downloads: Automatically download available subtitles in multiple languages alongside videos.
Channel filtering: Configure rules to download only specific videos based on title, duration, or upload date.
Notification system: Receive alerts when new videos are downloaded or when errors occur.
